alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:02AM CDT until April 20 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN MIAMI AND SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 401 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Hill, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Leawood, Paola, Spring Hill, Osawatomie, Louisburg, Hillsdale, Stanley, Wagstaff, Chiles, Bucyrus and Stillwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
